steps.description: AgNO3 in three concentrations of 0.5, 1, and 2 mM was dissolved in P. frutescens extract aqueous solution (1, 2.5, 5, and 10%, v/v)
mixture was sonicated for 90 min at 60 °C and in the dark condition
After that, the solution was centrifuged at 9000 rpm for 30 min and at 25 °C
Then, the sediment obtained was washed three times
Then, the sediment obtained was washed three times
Then, the sediment obtained was washed three times
